Package Services

Class OrderServices

  • java.lang.Object
    • Services.OrderServices
  • public class OrderServices
extends java.lang.Object
    Service class for managing orders. Provides methods to interact with the database and perform CRUD operations on orders and order items.

      • ChangeSugar

        public void ChangeSugar​(int OrderItemId,
                        int NewSugarPercentage)
        Updates the sugar level of a specific order item.
        Parameters:
        OrderItemId - The ID of the order item.
        NewSugarPercentage - The new sugar percentage (allowed values: 100, 75, 50, 25, 0).

        Parameters:
        OrderItemId - The ID of the order item.
        NewIcePercentage - The new ice percentage (allowed values: 100, 75, 50, 25, 0).

      • ChangeQuantity

        public void ChangeQuantity​(int OrderItemId,
                           int NewQuantity)
        Updates the quantity of a specific order item.
        Parameters:
        OrderItemId - The ID of the order item.
        NewQuantity - The new quantity (must be greater than or equal to 0).

      • createOrder

        public int createOrder​(java.lang.String OrderDate,
                       java.lang.String OrderTime,
                       java.math.BigDecimal TotalAmount,
                       int CashierId,
                       java.util.List<OrderItem> orderItems)
                throws java.sql.SQLException,
                       java.text.ParseException,
                       java.lang.Exception
        Creates a new order and deducts inventory for each item.
        Parameters:
        OrderDate - The order date (format: yyyy-MM-dd).
        OrderTime - The order time (format: HH:mm:ss).
        TotalAmount - The total amount for the order.
        CashierId - The ID of the cashier processing the order.
        orderItems - The list of order items.
        Returns:
        The order ID if successful, -1 if an error occurs.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        java.text.ParseException
        java.lang.Exception

      • deleteOrder

        public int deleteOrder​(int OrderId)
        Deletes an order from the database.
        Parameters:
        OrderId - The ID of the order to delete.
        Returns:
        1 if successful, 0 if failed, -1 if an error occurs.
